summary: The dramatic love story of small-town Mississippi girl Alva Starr and railroad official Owen Legate, set during the Great Depression.
cast: Natalie Wood|Robert Redford|Charles Bronson|Kate Reid|Mary Badham|Alan Baxter|Robert Blake|Dabney Coleman|John Harding|Ray Hemphill|Brett Pearson|Jon Provost|Robert Random|Quentin Sondergaard|Mike Steen|Bruce Watson|Glenn Allan|Billie Bird|Claire Carleton|Dale Hogan|Mike Mahoney|Irene Martin|Loretta Miller|Quinn Morrison|Ralph Roberts|Billy Street|Nick Stuart|Robert Swan|Guy Way|Geraldine West
title: Propiedad condenada
